ED_Title: Request for an advisory  opinion of the International Court of Justice on the legal consequences of the separation of the Chagos Archipelago from Mauritius in 1965
ED_DecisionText: At its 108th plenary meeting, on 6 September 2024, the General Assembly, the General Assembly decided to include the item entitled “Request for an advisory opinion of the International Court of Justice on the legal consequences of the separation of the Chagos Archipelago from Mauritius in 1965” in the draft agenda of its seventy-ninth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in document A/78/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
